Blog.post: I'm finally going home...2morrow...lol...i'm so pressed...i haven't seen my house in person in years...well it feels that way...lol...then i'm goin to seemommy and macky........yay! 2 bad i have skool monday..lol...ruin the hapiness and excitement...well...n-e who...lol...doin a lil mo last minute school shoppin......::singin::I"M SO HAPPY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!iight...ttyl bloggy buddy...lol urlLink urlLink

guess who's back guess who's back ria's back...lol...don't u juss love the song welcome back by mase?lol...yea me neither..lol..its pretty catchy tho'. urlLink that is how i feel today...so hyper...i gotta go some where 2day..i may ask my dad if we can go to the mall(if he doesn't work).or my mommy...thats my best friend.partners in crime we always say. urlLink we see eye 2 eye on almost eveything...there'z a few thingz u know...we reallly don't agree on...but lol...doesn't everyone...

"Life shouldn`t be measured in the breaths we take but in the moments that take our breath away... " "Never look back until you can no longer see forward" "There`s a light at the end of every tunnel, just pray it`s not a train." "The only time success comes before work is in the dictionary" "Anyone who thinks sunshine is pure happiness, has never danced in the rain" "Life is like a beautiful melody only the lyrics are messed up"

juss had 2 come on and blog again...lol..i'm startin 2 like this ... but yeah...i'm tempted to order a pizza...cuz i don't feel like cooking maybe i'll make a sandwich. yeah thats it..lol..good old fashioned p,b,&j. Man i'm watchin this movie pla'yd on b.e.t...what was the writers sippin when they thought of this...lol This is terrible...but its sorta like the biggie and pac beef...guess i'll go 4 now... :-) ....buh-bye
hey...pretty boring 2day...i'm waitin for this ceo to holla at me...im trynna get my songs made famous..lol..my moms came ova for lunch...i guess 2day was aight...but i can't wait to get home... :-)

it was quite interestng.i got lost.lol...but highschool is cool i guess...the same as junior high to me....just more freedom...but along with that freedom comes responsiblities...oh this is gonna one llllloooonnnnnggg...year...1...i'm posed' to be sleep.lol
i'm so sick of the hateration goin on in the world today.It's gettin madd old. don't hate...collaborate...congradgulate...or juss...get a life....
